directions: Place bananas in a blender. Layer coconut milk, water, ice cubes, dates, cacao powder, ginger root, turmeric root, cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla extract over bananas, in that order. Cover and pulse until shake is very smooth. Dates will remain in chunks to represent "cookie dough chews".
ingredients: ⅔ cup coconut milk (such as Calafia®)
1 tablespoon peeled and chopped fresh turmeric root
title: Cinnamon Cookie Dough Superfood Shake
